Action.Name: Cursor.Restore
Action.Description: Restores the specified cursor type to its default cursor (the cursor recorded when the application started).

Arg.Name: Cursor Type
Arg.Description: The type of cursor to restore (the system cursor ID).

Action.Name: Cursor.RestoreAll
Action.Description: Restores all cursor types to their default cursors (the cursors recorded when the application started).

Extended.Description:
Allows the changing of the system cursors.
Many thanks to Reteset...I could not have made this plugin without the first two lines of code that you provided.
Thanks to Tigger for his list of cursor types and values.
